title: RC V 42 month questionnaire (fine motor)

fine_motor_section.question_text: Does your child stack small blocks or toys in a tower at least 9 blocks high?
Does your child use scissors to cut across a piece of paper?
Does your child draw a complete circle on paper while holding the pencil correctly?
Does your child thread beads onto a string or shoelace?
Does your child use a fork to eat independently without dropping much food?

problem_solving_section.question_text: Can your child match identical items or pictures when you give them several to choose from?
Does your child complete a simple jigsaw puzzle of 4-6 large pieces?
Does your child point to the correct shape when you ask for a circle, square, or triangle?

notes: Parent expressed concerns about cutting with scissors and puzzle-solving abilities. Follow-up recommended.
